/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with patches of greenery, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, going about their day, while cars are parked neatly on the side of the road. The sky above is a clear blue, with power lines crisscrossing above the street, a common sight in many cities. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's vibrant energy and architectural charm.
